definitions.definition: Saturday and Sunday, or Friday evening until Sunday night; the part of the week in which many people living in the West do not go to work:
examples: This/Next weekend we're going to see some friends.

definitions.definition: a trip or a visit at a weekend:
examples: How much would a weekend for two in New York cost?

definitions.definition: on Saturday or Sunday, or on both Saturday and Sunday:
examples: What did you do at the weekend?

definitions.definition: usually or often between Friday evening and Sunday night, or on Saturdays and Sundays:
